Atlanta.Alonzo A. Crim Open Campus High School: Alonzo A. Crim Open Campus High School is a public high school in Atlanta, Georgia, United States. It is located at 256 Clifton Street SE. It replaced Alonzo A. Crim Comprehensive High School after it closed in 2005. Part of Atlanta Public Schools, it is located in southeast Atlanta, in the Kirkwood neighborhood.
